questions.text: Do you think there might be life beyond Earth?

options.text: The universe is a big place, so why not?
I'm not convinced yet, but I'm open to learning more!

questions.text: Do you believe humans will establish colonies on other planets within the next century?

options.text: Yes, I think we'll have colonies on other planets.
No, I believe it's unlikely within the next century.
I'm not sure, it depends on technological advancements.

questions.text: What role do you think private companies should have in space exploration?

options.text: They should lead and drive space exploration efforts.
They should collaborate with governments but not lead.
They should have limited involvement, with governments leading exploration.
